name: Mothim
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by Combee.

poke_body.name: Disturbance Scales
poke_body.effect: Any damage done by attacks from your Pokémon to the Defending Pokémon isn’t affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Get Help
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage times the number of different types of Wormadam on your Bench.

attacks.name: Quick Touch
attacks.effect: You may switch Mothim with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, move as many Energy cards attached to Mothim as you like to the new Active Pokémon.
